prop.name: disabledKey
prop.description: disabled key in each item object. only works when items prop is list of objects.

prop.name: textKey
prop.description: text key in each item object. only works when items prop is list of objects.

prop.name: sourceElement
prop.description: Element that try to open menu. fvMenu use this to calculate menu position. You can pass $event.target inside @click event of element that try to open the menu.

event.name: input
event.description: Fired when component request to change value (close and open request by dialog).

event.name: click
event.description: Fired when user clicked on a menu item.

note: fvMenu should atleast one fvMain parent with parent prop.
